name: BACKTRACK-BOT
description: This is a simple WhatsApp bot built with Node.js and Baileys with MD support.

PREFIX.description: Prefix of the dreaded bot. Ex: ., /, #, & etc. Put any symbol

DEV.description: Phone numbers of bot owners without + or spaces, separated by commas. Ex: 254114018035,254741889898,254799884226

NOT_OWNER_MSG.description: Message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only the owner user is violated. Example: Owner only

BOT_ADMIN_MSG.description: Message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires the bot to be admin is violated. Example: Bot is not admin!

ADMIN_MSG.description: Message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only the owner user is violated. Example: Only admins are allowed to use this command

BAD_WORD.description: List of words separated by commas that will be considered as bad and will trigger the bot to kick. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to automatically kick group members using words that you have listed as bad

GROUP_ONLY_MSG.description: Message that the bot will send if a parameter that works only in group chats is violated. Example: This command will work in groups only

AUTOREAD.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to automatically read messages in private chats

AUTOVIEW.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to automatically read status updates

WA_PRESENCE.description: Input either 'recording' or 'typing'. This enables the bot to simulate typing or recording

ANTILINK.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to kick users who send links

ANTILINK_ALL.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to kick users sending any links

ANTIBOT.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to kick other bots from the group

WELCOME.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to send a welcome message to new members

ANTIFOREIGN.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to kick non-Kenyan numbers joining

AUTOBIO.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to automatically update its about with the current time and date

APP_NAME.description: Input your app name that you put above

GPT_INBOX.description: Put TRUE here if you want the bot to auto-reply to inbox messages using the OpenAI API

MENU_TYPE.description: Input either 'VIDEO', 'LINK', or 'IMAGE'. This will allow the bot to display different dynamic menu types

AI.description: Put your OpenAI API key here. This will allow AI features to work correctly. This key starts with 'sk-'
